{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Farallon |model=PN8581-1 |revision= |is_manuf=No |type=access point |fcc_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |wi1_module=Farallon SkyLINE PN473 (473) |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Harris |wi1_chip1_model=HFA3841 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861 |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=b }} {{TagLine|NetLINE Wireless Broadband Gateway}}
Probably referred to as just the PN8581, may have been sold with and without the wireless module.
*[https://www.cnet.com/products/farallon-netline-wireless-broadband-gateway-gateway/specs/ ''Farallon NetLINE PN8581 Spec.'' on '''C|Net'''] ([http://www.sekaimon.com/us/101270/Modem-Router+Combos/232881932249/ images]) *[https://in.pcmag.com/proxim-netline-pn8541-1/5766/review/proxim-netline-pn8541-1 ''Proxim NetLine PN8541-1'' on '''PC|Mag'''] :[[Proxim]] RangeLAN/Symphony :Farallon NetLINE/SkyLINE
